NewsItem.HEADLINE: 5G Broadband 2018 Excel
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This is the 7-year 5G forecast file for 2018-2025, including 5G base stations and client devices. Breakdowns include 5G RRH shipments by band, by 5GTF vs 5G NR, by NSA vs SA, by region, and by power level.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report is the gold standard for information on 5G deployment. The forecast is based on operator inputs and also based on benchmarks of traffic density of various world networks, estimating the number of sites in each network that actually will profit from the addition of 5G capacity. The overall forecast reflects strong growth in China for the near term and slower growth worldwide.
